word: Here was presented to the human mind spiritual and glorious light. "The Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us . . . full of grace and truth." What nearness to God we may experience! What views of heaven we may obtain! But that which is of the greatest importance to all who live their life to God is for them to understand their daily service for Jesus Christ, in representing His character in meekness and lowliness of heart, and in being good and doing good.
